name: Nursery Mania
overview: Step Into the Worldful and Challenging World of Childcare! Operate a nursery and take care of your very own darling baby! Experience the endless rewards of caring for a child in this babysitting-inspired game for Nintendo DS! - Engage in childcare activities such as cleaning, feeding and playing - Keep your baby happy with a range of fun games - "Accessorize" your baby with diapers, pacifiers, blankets and more
